article_title: The Morning After: Google's giving away two free months of Stadia Pro
article_description: While Zoom frantically tries to reassure users that its teleconferencing app can be safe and secure  Google is again reshuffling the deck chairs of its messaging strategy  The good news  for now  is that it has not launched a new service  yet  instead  as co
article_content: Disney  already has 50 million paying subscribers That s a lot of people waiting for  The Mandalorian  season two Disney s streaming service has only been around for five months and despite a lack of hit original content  it s already amassed an impressive   2715 chars
